answers.answer: Hi!First get your blood pressure checked. This could be due to high blood pressure. The other possibility is clot in some blood vessel. This can also give out heat sensation without there being any temperature. Hyperthyroidism, diabetes, temporal arteritis are the other possibilities. It can also be an allergic reaction to some soap or oil etc. In females it could also be due to menopause.A comprehensive investigation is required keeping all the points in mind. Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!

question: I've had this situation happen to me a lot when I was younger. If I got up a wrong way a little too fast my left side of my head popped. It feels to me like a blood vessel popping inside my head and bursting for like 3 minutes then after wards it feels really warm there. I don't know what it is. I rarely get headaches like really never I only had them 2 times
title: My head just popped???
